query.sql: SELECT title, class_id, header_id, (select c.class_name from fnd_class c where c.class_id = t.class_id) class_name, course_id, status status_code, (select concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) from fnd_branch b,fnd_course c where b.branch_id = c.branch_id and c.course_id= t.course_id) course_name, (SELECT code_name FROM sys_code t where t.code='JOB_STATUS' and t.code_value= status) status_name, end_time, (select teacher_name from fnd_teacher te where te.teacher_id = t.teacher_id) teacher_name, (select count(1) from sys_upload_file f where f.table_name ='job_headers' and pk_value = header_id) att_num, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM job_headers t where t.teacher_id = (SELECT teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher s WHERE s.teacher_code = ${@user_code}) and t.status !='END' #AND_CLAUSE# order by t.create_date desc

query.sql: SELECT title, class_id, (select c.class_name from fnd_class c where c.class_id = t.class_id) class_name, (select concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) from fnd_branch b,fnd_course c where b.branch_id = c.branch_id and c.course_id= t.course_id) course_name, header_id, description, course_id, (SELECT code_name FROM sys_code t where t.code='JOB_STATUS' and t.code_value= status) status_name, end_time, (select teacher_name from fnd_teacher te where te.teacher_id = t.teacher_id) teacher_name FROM job_headers t where header_id = ${@header_id}

sqls.querySql: select teacher_id from fnd_teacher t where t.teacher_code = ${@user_code}
sqls.executeSql: INSERT INTO job_headers (header_id, class_id, course_id, teacher_id, end_time, status, title, description, create_by, last_update_by, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (${@header_id}, ${@class_id}, ${@course_id}, ${@teacher_id}, ${@end_time}, 'NEW', ${@title}, ${@description}, ${@user_id}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), NOW())

update job_headers set class_id =${@class_id}, course_id =${@course_id}, end_time=${@end_time}, description =${@description}, last_update_by=${@user_id}, last_update_date =NOW() where header_id = ${@header_id}
